message: Hello, I'd like to order 3 chicken alfredos and 1 pepperoni pizza

Great! I found Chicken Alfredo for AED 35.0 each and Pepperoni for AED 43.0 on our menu. The total comes to AED 148.00. Would you like to place an order for these items? Please respond with 'yes' to confirm or 'no' to cancel.

Great! You have provided your NYU ID (999301) and chosen Building Number (B1). Now I just need your phone number to complete the order. Please provide a valid phone number for contact purposes. Once you confirm, I will send you the order confirmation.

Thank you for providing your phone number, 123456. Your order of 3 Chicken Alfredo and 1 Pepperoni pizza has been successfully placed with NYU ID 999301 and will be delivered to Building Number B1. You will receive a confirmation shortly. If you need to make any changes or have additional questions, please reply to this message. Thank you for choosing our dining hall!
